description:
Fully renovated apartment with washer, dryer, and dishwasher in the unit. Centrally located in East Village, known for its restaurant and bars. Enjoy the convenience of the neighborhood and the proximity to the subway.

You can't get much better than this. One flight up with a washer and dryer in the apartment and a dishwasher too! All the conveniences you could want in your NYC stay. Fully renovated and spacious 1-bedroom, 1-bathroom apartment.

Full access to the entire apartment

I am available by text (preferable), phone, or email. I am also usually nearby and can assist when needed.

East Village has fantastic restaurants and bars, from quick food options to high end dining, dive bars to classy cocktail bars. Food choices and variety abound! Tompkins Square Park is one block away. Bring a book there to relax on the lawn or catch a free summer Thursday night movie in the park. Several delis, pharmacies, and a supermarket within a block or two.

The apartment is very conveniently located near several different options for public transportation. The M14A bus stops directly in front of the apartment and it's a 5 min walk to the L train which connects to every subway line. M8, M9, and M14D buses are all also within a 5 min walk or less.
name: Renovated East Village Apt (W/D & dishwasher)
review: This is a great apartment. The location is excellent and the recommendations from the host were spot on. I really enjoyed my stay and wished I could stay longer. Don't hesitate booking. You will have a fun time!
